Constructor Detail

Profile

public Profile(int profileID,
               String display_name,
               String password_hash,
               String secret_q,
               String secret_a,
               int theme)
Class constructor creates and initializes the variables for a new profile

Parameters:
profileID - Used to initialize the profile ID of the new profile
display_name - Used to initialize the username of the new profile
password_hash - Used to initialize the password of the new profile
secret_q - Used to initialize the secret question of the new profile
secret_a - Used to initialize the secret answer of the new profile
theme - Used to initialize the theme of the new profile
Method Detail

getProfiles

public static Cursor getProfiles()
Used to retrieve all the users in the database Gets a table with the usernames and profileIDs of all users in the database.

Returns:
returns a cursor on a table of all users in the database.

create

public static int create(String userName,
                         String password,
                         String secretQ,
                         String secretA)
Creates a new profile in the database with the values given NOTE: Don't pass in a profileID, will be inserted automatically

Parameters:
userName - Username that will be inserted to the database.
password - Password that will be inserted to the database.
secretQ - Secret question that will be inserted to the database.
secretA - Secret answer that will be inserted to the database.
Returns:
The id number of the profile that was just inserted in the database.

load

public static Profile load(int profileID)
Loads a profile from the database, specified by the profileID. Retrieves the data that corresponds to the requested ProfileID, and creates a profile with these values then returns the profile. Does not update the active profile.

Parameters:
profileID - The profileID of the profile you want to load
Returns:
A profile with the values of the requested ProfileID otherwise throws RuntimeException

authenticate

public static Profile authenticate(String user,
                                   String pass)
Used to check a string matches the password of a specified Profile Retrieves the 'password_hash' of the requested profile from the database and compares it this to the result of hashing the password that is passed in as a parameter. If they match the requested profile is returned.

Parameters:
user - The username of the profile requested
pass - The string to be compared to the password of the requested profile
Returns:
The profile requested otherwise null

checkName

public static boolean checkName(String userName)
Checks a profile with the given username exists in the database

Parameters:
userName - the username to be checked.
Returns:
True if a profile with the given username exists otherwise false.

hashPassword

public static String hashPassword(String password)
Hashes a users password for storage in the database.

Parameters:
password - the password to be Hashed
Returns:
The hash value of the given password

getUserLevel

public static int getUserLevel()
Gets the the level of the currently active profile. Gets the best scores in all tests done by the currently active profile. Then returns the lowest level where all tests have been passed(achieved a mark of 75%) + 1. NOTE: Does not include test results for lang_entity 9 because a test for the male/female topic has not been implemented.

Returns:
The currently active users level.

toString

public String toString()
Overrides:
toString in class Object
